H0.text: In which city is the majority of Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet set. Verona

H1.text: In which city is the majority of Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet set. Milan

H2.text: In which city is the majority of Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet set. Florence

H3.text: In which city is the majority of Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet set. Vetona

A4.text: Two of William Shakespeare's plays are set in Verona: Romeo and Juliet (which also features Romeo's visit to Mantua) and The Two Gentlemen of Verona.
